description:
Seams are for the past with smoothness reigning supreme. With an ultrasonic quilting technique, meaning no seams, and body mapped fabric, the Voss Cross provides a cozy streamlined fit. Strategic patterning focuses warmth and breathability where you need it most, keeping you dry when you’re training. Add in a full zipper and insulated hood to create a carefully crafted training partner for your cold runs.

  • Precisely placed panels of stretchy polyester provide a body mapped fit that keeps you moving, no matter the sport
  • A stitch-less ultrasonic quilting technique provides a seamless experience for an ultra-smooth feel and easy layering
  • Lightweight synthetic insulation has an excellent warmth to weight ratio and even stays warm when wet, so you carry on in the cold
  • A breathable back fabric lets your body heat out when you’re pushing your limits
  • A full zip and adjustable hood give you full coverage as the element’s pickup
name: Kari Traa Voss Cross Jacket - Women's
